name: Heaton Tutoring
body:
### Heaton Tutoring
Friendly, supportive tutoring from a fully qualified and experienced primary teacher

### Tutor
My name is Catherine Powell.  I am a fully qualified primary teacher with experience of working with children from Year 1 to Year 6 in local primary schools.  I have extensive experience of supporting children on a 1:1 basis including children with special educational needs.

### Personal Support
I offer personalised support tailored to your child's individual needs in all areas of the curriculum. Individual attention by a qualified teacher means your child can really focus on those areas of most importance.

### Contact
Please get in touch to discuss how I may be able to help your child using my [my email address](heatontutoring7@gmail.com) or [Facebook page](https://www.facebook.com/heatontutoring/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
